sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form @submit="addTodo">
    <input type="text" v-model="title" name="title" placeholder="Add to do" />
    <input type="submit" value="Submit" class="btn" />
  </form>
</template>

<script>
import uuid from 'uuid'
export default {
  name: "AddTodo",
  data(){
      return{
          title:''
      }
  },
  methods:{
      addTodo(){
          const newTodo = {
              id:uuid.v4(),
              title:this.title,
              completed:false,
          }

          //send up to parent
          this.$emit('add-toto',newTodo);
      }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
form {
  display: flex;
}
input[type="text"] {
  flex: 10;
  padding: 5px;
}
input[type="submit"] {
  flex: 5;
}
</style>
